name: preact-component-scss
description: A Preact component library with SCSS styling
author: Prachwal

scripts.version-check: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const fs = require('fs'); let pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json', 'utf8')); try { const published = execSync('npm view ' + pkg.name + ' version', { encoding: 'utf8' }).trim(); if (published === pkg.version) { console.log('Version ' + pkg.version + ' is already published. Bumping patch version...'); execSync('npm version patch --no-git-tag-version', { stdio: 'inherit' }); pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json', 'utf8')); console.log('Version bumped to: ' + pkg.version); } else { console.log('Local version (' + pkg.version + ') differs from published (' + published + '). No action needed.'); } } catch (e) { console.log('Package not found on npm or network error. This might be the first publish.'); }"
